name: Cruel Solitaire Premium - Plus
description:
Play this fantastic Cruel Solitaire Premium.This is a Deluxe edition.

This game features 4 different variants and 4 leaderboards.

Enhance your experience by customizing your card set with 50 different combinations of front and back to choose from.

No ads.

NB: we have many other solitaire, strategy, word or action games in the apps store.
